website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive. Not suited for high-end projection equipment, but it's still a solid deal if you are watching your budget.

customer_reviews.title: It's a square!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe the other reviews but it is really a square. That's ok as such, you can only open half if you want 16;9, for example. However be aware that a square with 119" diagonal is actually not very wide. A 100" 16:9 is 3" wider, giving out a bigger screen overall. So I sent it back, misleading website description and pictures. The product itself was fine (if you are ok with an 85x85" square...
customer_reviews.author: Ulrich Lang

customer_reviews.title: Screen received is 84x84!
customer_reviews.text: The description says Screen Dimensions: 92.5“(L) x 74.5“(H); but the screen I just received is a square 84" by 84". Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: TheGoodLife

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice it works great and the price was fantastic thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Оthe description does not correspond to the facts!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. The description says Screen Dimensions (Within White Lines): 92.5 "(L) x 74.5" (H); Diagonal Screen Dimensions: 119 ”. Size does not match the description. in fact, 83.5 "× 83.5". I wasted time and installation resources. I really do not recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nuzh08

customer_reviews.title: Advertised size is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I got this screen is the size advertised in the description: 92.5x74.5in, exactly what I needed for my protector setup. But nope, it's a useless 87x87 square, including the black margin. I can't even return it. There are better brands available on Amazon, stay away from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nebirhos

customer_reviews.title: Trash quality
customer_reviews.text: My screen arrived and mostly seemed fine out side a noticeable bend in the metal of the rollers cosmetic frame. I attempted to hang the screen first and experience the screen falling to the ground and unraveling upon the first light pull immediately. I thought it may be a fixable issue so I disassembled the product and reassembled it thinking that I had discovered the issue. (The issue I thought was a problem was that the screen itself comes out of the holders very easily, a problem but not the one I had) turns out the spring on the inside sucks and there is no hope. I have spent money and time on a poorly made product :(.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Large. Good quality. Pulls and retracts smoothly. I only just got it, but so far it's well worth the money. Witcher 3 at 80 inches is a beautiful thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: I have my room pretty dark so maybe this wasnt the proper screen to ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen is what I wanted except it is way to shiny. I have my room pretty dark so maybe this wasnt the proper screen to get for me. I have a different screen downstairs thats more of a matte color that looks way better. This almost has a shimmery effect and no matter how dim I make my projector it doesnt go away. It would probably be more suited for a theater set up outside or with a room that has a lot of light. I tried to take a picture of what I am talking about but it doesnt shoe up on my picture.
customer_reviews.author: T Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Received my screen today. Mounted it directly to the wall over framed family photos. No problem with clearance over the photos. This screen has an 84" wide viewable surface, not including the black masking. Since I project a combination of 16:9 widescreen, 4:3 16mm films, and 35mm slides, this screen ratio works better. Slightly narrower than a 100" 16:9 screen, by the time I project 4:3 I can get a much larger image with those formats. Quality wise, the screen seems well built. The surface is very nice and the screen retracts right back up: no wimpy springs. Nice. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything That You Need
customer_reviews.text: Watched movies on this screen fora bit more than 3 months now. I do not think that you need anything more than this screen, because everything is flawless. The retrieving mechanism is working fine, the matte finish is reflecting just right amount of light of the projector. The size is good for an average house living room. Could have not wished for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: SashaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great value and a great screen.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect screen for the money. I really wish it was a bit wider, but I did not want to spend over $200 for a screen I only plan on using occasionally outside on my back porch. Arrived fast and packaging was great. No damage on mine and screen pulls down and stays flat. Super easy installation. Looks great. Yes it is a square but you can easily leave it partially retracted to create a perfect 16 x 9 frame. It needs a little nudge to get it to retract 100% of the way back, but otherwise I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Man Diller

customer_reviews.title: Its very big and considerably light but main feature is that it makes for a great backdrop that can also scroll away
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for almost two years without issue. Its very big and considerably light but main feature is that it makes for a great backdrop that can also scroll away. It does whiten and brighten images projected to it which is necessary for the less than new projector currently being used. A must have for any projector user unless your setup can project larger than the dimensions. The setup i have , this was actually perfect to the max displayable area. Howeve before i had a setup that would shoot 2ft over this size so consider that.
customer_reviews.author: Know it ALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Came with Huge Dent in the screen holder
customer_reviews.text: The product was dented about three inches in the container and looks ridiculous. It was too much work to send it back. Not impressed tho. Everything else was great. Picture is wonderful and it is a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Swatzell

customer_reviews.title: Pulled down and will not go back up. Weak internal spring. arrived in broken condition.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and seemed intact for such a long box. Opened item and found several dents in the casing of the screen. Thought to myself that will be fine, no one really looks at that. Installed screen in Family room. Pulled screen down and found several creases (looks Permanent) and tears in the screen. Ugg! Gonna have to send back- tried to get screen to roll back up but it would not. Spring seems weak or broken. Have contacted seller so awaiting reply.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel & Janet

customer_reviews.title: At a 16:9 ratio, diagonal is only 97"
customer_reviews.text: While this is a nice screen that is easy to install, it is completely misleading in the way it is advertised and the dimensions given. The dimensions listed are for the overall size. The white area of the screen is much, much smaller. It is only 83.5" wide. At a 16:9 ratio, that gives you overall screen dimensions of 83.5" x 47" which translates to a usable diagonal of only 97" - much less than the 120" you are led to believe you are getting with a product headline of "119in HD Indoor Pull Down Manual Widescreen Projector Screen"
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: great screen for a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why reviews for this product are saying this is a square screen. You can make it whatever you want. I have mine set as a widescreen and works great. I love this screen so much, I purchased a second one. I've put it up against my wall on my house at the yard for night time viewing with the kids. the only complaint I have is that it's not 120 inches. Its more around 108-110 inches. Again for this price, I can forgive this.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Easy Up and down good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease using this picture screen. It was my first and its' joy to watch movies on and it will great for sports events as well. I'm sure my guess will truly enjoy their experience and want to return for the next event. The screen is 119 inches and the perfect size for a medium-sized room. I use it over my tv and it's very easy to go up and down so I can watch both movies and tv. I like the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: michael a. brown

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It's huge! Lol
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing! Great product. It's huge! Lol I knew the measurements but once it's infront it's even bigger then we thought. You cannot beat the price at this size and quality. We love it! We used the recommended hanger and it's awesome! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: IheartShopping

customer_reviews.title: Square Screen, noT 119" only 98-99"
customer_reviews.text: Screen is well built but not straight on the sides after pulling it down. It may change after it has been extracted with use. I am OK with that but what I am mostly disappointed is the actual screen is not 16:9 or 119" as advertised. Like others have mentioned, it is a SQUARE Screen. I will be returning it asap.....
customer_reviews.author: It's-Just-Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: This screen is larger than I was expecting! It fits nicely in the space we had designated for it. We are waiting for our projector mount to arrive but we did a trial run. This seems to be what we were looking for and will fit our needs great. It was easy to install. We simply screwed hooks into our ceiling through the upstairs floor truss. It arrived with a small dent that isn't noticeable from the front and doesn't affect function. It shipped quickly and arrived earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: JourneyBlu

customer_reviews.title: Use it Everywhere it fits
customer_reviews.text: The only con is you can tell its not quite made with the same quality your school projector screens that screeched were made of. That said, i have had 0 issues other than bugs landing on it while i'm watching a movie outdoors. I do not use it as permanent install, so the durability has added shelf life I think in my setup. I did leave it out in the rain one time where it hangs and i haven't seen any water or rust issues.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Usable after some repairs
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent projector screen but the one I received was damaged. The roll was completely dislocated from the housing so when it was pulled open for the first time there was no way to retract it. Due to its size it would have been cumbersome to attempt a return I so opened the end caps for the housing. One of the "bearings" was pushed about 3" into the rod center. I was able to pull it back out and secure it with a screw, had to retention the rod and put everything back together. The shipping box had no signs of damage on the ends so this was a manufacturing fault.
customer_reviews.author: Adama

customer_reviews.title: Honestly Great
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier. As a teacher, I use this screen M-F every week without ever giving it a break. It rolls up and down like a pro and the projection area lays nice and flat. It is usually down, since I only roll it up at the end of the day and roll it down as soon as I get to school so that might make a difference in keeping it wrinkle-free but I could not more highly recommend this screen.
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: This screen is great. I'm using a relatively cheap projector
customer_reviews.text: This screen is great. I'm using a relatively cheap projector, and this screen helps the colors to pop out a little better, and gives a good contrast to the image. I was a bit skeptical due to the price tag, but I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick Bone

customer_reviews.title: This helps greatly in reflecting the light and makes for a great viewing experience!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product still use it today. I set this up in my bedroom and it allows to have a large screen. Without the setbacks of space. I can put the screen away very easily unlike a TV you have to move it around. I purchased a projector and mounted it over the bed. This allows me to put the TV away easily
customer_reviews.author: Tomrosebush

customer_reviews.title: Do it - you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: Such a good deal. I watch movies and play PS4 on this thing all the time. $80 for a screen?!? thats great. Combine that with a decent $600 projector and you're wayyyy ahead of just about anyone with a 52" flat screen. Do it. You wont be able to go back when you football players appear bigger than phone books and your First-Person-Shooter is life size Did I mention it's a 10' diagonal and portable?
customer_reviews.author: DougieDougDoug

customer_reviews.title: Best, biggest screen, for the money, hands down
customer_reviews.text: Awesome screen. Biggest, actual screen (not a sheet you have to hang on the wall with tape and/or nails) for the money. Crisp, clear picture. Retracts easily. Two mountable options, either by 2 screws in the wall or hooks from the ceiling (you provide screws/hooks). Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Phathom

customer_reviews.title: Def not 120” at 16:9 widescreen
customer_reviews.text: The description says widescreen, which I would assume to mean the industry standard 16:9. It definitely is not 16:9 - it’s much closer to a square. Sure you can pull it down less, but when you pull down to only do a 16:9, then you have a ~100” screen - not the 120” I thought I was buying. You also lose the top black border.
customer_reviews.author: chuckda4th

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Practical
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it in my garden. When it rains I just keep it closed but even if I left it open it didn't affected at all. It's really practical and good quality. I definitely suggest it. Note: The picture quality is really good for me but if you're looking for something you'll use with really high end 4K projector don't count my review :)
customer_reviews.author: Melih

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 a few years ago. Used it nearly every day until the spring broke and it wouldn't go back up. Screen was still fine so family member used it as a dedicated screen. But I kept it down and never put it back up so it was my fault it broke. Great scree. For the money.
customer_reviews.author: RBlack

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. My only issue is the screen is a little thin and is bends in a bit. I use this screen outside and replaced an 20 year old screen that was very heavy grade with not bending. But overall great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover 06241964

customer_reviews.title: It pulls down easily and glides back up smoothly
customer_reviews.text: This screen is huge and works perfectly! We hung hooks in our ceiling in both the bedroom and the living room so we can move our projector and screen into whichever room we want. It pulls down easily and glides back up smoothly. I was definitely pleased with this purchase and how affordable it was.
customer_reviews.author: Gfamily

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, looks great, easy installation!
customer_reviews.text: Serves my purpose, I like it. It's a little big for me but that's why I got it rather have too much than too little. I had tried a cloth one that you kind of just stretch across the wall and use stickies to holdup at that had wrinkles. That didn't work out didn't look very nice. I like that I had the option to mounted kind of like a shelf or hang it
customer_reviews.author: Yannick

customer_reviews.title: NOT 119IN LIES
customer_reviews.text: This is not 119in. It's only 91in. Was very hard to put up because didnt fit the space measured for the screen. Talked to seller and sent 2 that wasnt 119in. I sent them back. Never for the right size
customer_reviews.author: QUEENAMILLI

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you purchase the right size, they won’t refund you. I Purchased there largest screen, which is to small for my space and they haven’t gotten back to me about a refund. I have been trying to return the item for 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality at cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: The screen is not flat, it’s so wavy. The edges are so rough, the screen is not mounted in the center at the bottom. It doesn’t close all the way evenly. If you don’t have a budget for a decent screen just paint your wall white.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works as needed and beyond.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. A year + later and only the string is a bit frayed. I have it in a common use area and it get's used by all the organizations in my building. We have never had a problem. We direct mounted it to a "plank" and studded mounted the plank to the wall. This allowed us to place it where needed while supporting its weight on thin plasterboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: get one with a better ratio. That being said - it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted (and I didn't catch when I purchased), the image is misleading. This is a 1:1 ratio screen - it's square! If you're planning on showing movies, get one with a better ratio. That being said - it was a perfectly fine pull-down screen - but the misleading image severely disappoints me.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector screen for the price. My only issue with this product is the sides curl just a bit since it stays rolled up. Not a huge deal but that's why it's a 4 star rather than 5.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Curlin

customer_reviews.title: Well built, extremely sturdy and very large
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, the measurements were exact. Screen casing is extremely study and well put together. Screen is clean and smooth. Extremely easy to hang using either hooks for hanging, or attached flat to the wall with a couple of screws. I tried both and prefer flat to the wall because of the size. As you can see in one of the photo's, I need to raise the screen because it is quite large. It took about 15 minutes to hang and because of the location, it did not require any additional help.
customer_reviews.author: MissF

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality at a great price! Just installed this screen on the wall of our classroom today at church. The bright white finish on the case makes a crisp contrast on the wall. The white screen finish makes my inexpensive used projector look like a champ! Easy to put up, easy pull down and great view. Thus truly is your best choice!
customer_reviews.author: GRW

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Housing had a dent in the middle, screen is square but you can adjust height, easy install. You get what you pay for but I’d recommend if you want to save money, I also have a $2,500 electric screen, picture quality is a lost the same.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Dees

customer_reviews.title: not sure about size
customer_reviews.text: it says it's 120", which might be the case for 4:3. at 16:9 its barely 100". the projector i got needs a 110" minimum for my installation. if it wasnt for that I would give it 5 stars. image is sharp, mechanism works good, the backing is solid and filters light very well
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: 4:3 format, beware!
customer_reviews.text: This item came up as I was searching for 16:9 screens. It is a 4:3 and completely unusable for what is was intended to be. I destroyed the box (my fault) so now it is living in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Cody G.

customer_reviews.title: Its Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Product on top was bent real bad in shipping, nice size, not really clear. Needing to return but will cost more in shipping back than I paid. Dont like these problems with 3rd party products.
customer_reviews.author: Nothin w/o Jesus

customer_reviews.title: 100in size
customer_reviews.text: The seller is misleading the buyer, the screen does not have 119 in the actual size is 100 in With the maximum size of the video, you can only watch in 4: 3 format. This is the main thing you need to know. And in another, the screen is good.
customer_reviews.author: valentin

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment and nice packaging. The screen is way too big for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment and nice packaging. The screen is way too big for my room but I worked my way out. Because he mount hook is on both end of the metal bar, I could fit it to my wall. So I put it upside down with the heavy part on a table and hang the handle on wall. Works nice!
customer_reviews.author: Matilda Dong

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not as described in description. The screen is not as wide as stated. I believe it’s 84x84.. Sent it back only to receive the same size screen with damaged case. The quality is there though
customer_reviews.author: Josh Carty

customer_reviews.title: Projector arrived dented and broken
customer_reviews.text: My projector showed up with a dent in the side, and part of the bottom knob thing (the white thing) was missing. But the amount of time and energy involved in returning this big ass thing wouldnt be worth it. Either way, I got it setup and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mister

customer_reviews.title: Needed for projecting where no walls available
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for a large room with no clear walls to project on. My only complaint is that after a few times of pulling it down and putting it back up it doesn't roll back quite as tight. Only a small difference.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O. Parker

customer_reviews.title: VERY Disappointed. Product is in poor condition for being brand new.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved item, super easy to install. Brand new, straight from the box. After install I pull down the screen and there is what appears to be BLOOD stains on one side of the screen and as you can see the other side looks like someone took a bite out of it! There are more tears along the side but not as noticeable in picture versus in person. Any type of 'quality control' ??? Looks as I may have recieved one that someone had returned...
customer_reviews.author: Adam K

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: This projector was great, up until it just died. You turn it on and nothing...kinda bummed out that it didn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerX

customer_reviews.title: nice size, works well with a mini projector for ...
customer_reviews.text: nice size, works well with a mini projector for drive in night. Made some hooks with carbineer clasps so I can easily set it up and take it down when done.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Kharma

customer_reviews.title: It was a good product when viewing though 80 inch width was not ...
customer_reviews.text: After a week of using it suddenly opened up from the set position for viewing. Now it refuses to retract. It was a good product when viewing though 80 inch width was not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Selva Selvendran

customer_reviews.title: I wish it came with some l like other screens do
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because i wish i knew i had to buy additional wall or ceiling hanging supplies in order to use it right out of the box. I wish it came with some l like other screens do.
customer_reviews.author: TSurprin

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, only issue was the delivery, it came a lot sooner than expected so I end up missing the delivery guy, No problem I was able to pick it up and without no dents or scratches, I would highly recommend you not signing the package until you inspect it first. I only had some me plastic off a little and box a little dent but the product wasn’t affect by it at all. Very happy about that. I give it 5 Stars it’s much better than a 65 4K inch. This is Home Theater at its finest!! Not a brag but a fact Happy yet satisfied customer. Yes I will recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of nnaccurate product description - only 84"x84"
customer_reviews.text: Product quality seems to be fine.However, it doesn't meet the description posted. The view-able dimension is actually 84" (L) x84" (H). The advertised dimension is 92.5“(L) x 74.5“(H). Shipped back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: willower

customer_reviews.title: this one gets out of the way as easy as raising a window shade
customer_reviews.text: It's hanging from the ceiling of my garage and produces a clear image from an LED projector. Couldn't have a screen permanently taking up the end wall; this one gets out of the way as easy as raising a window shade.
customer_reviews.author: grouch

customer_reviews.title: ... wall with heavy duty flush mount and its been great for kids video games and movie night
customer_reviews.text: Purchased mine last year and affixed it to my wall with heavy duty flush mount and its been great for kids video games and movie night!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Movie theater experience without having to go to the movies!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best option for my home theater set up. It's incredibly affordable. The other option I was considering was DIY but this seemed like the better way to go. I'm glad I made the decision. It had a funky smell for a while but, that went away. I love that I can just roll it up so it doesn't affect the aesthetics of my living room and I can have a movie theater experience whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenWandDove

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Pro's.
customer_reviews.text: Durable steel construction, screen reflects nicely, high quality paint finish on exterior shrouding, smooth mechanical action, strong recoil(spring). These pro's are true custom manufacturers, and are good and efficient at making projection screens. They are on the ball and very reccomended.
customer_reviews.author: 100MarkM59/ Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I rotate this from hanging under my gazebo and in my garage for watching movies. It works great. Feels very sturdy and easy to hang. It retracts perfectly every time. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShoppingAddict

customer_reviews.title: LIES!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product description claims that this is a 119 inch 16:9 projector screen. It's actually an 84' x 84' square!! I should have heeded the warnings of the other reviewers. Returning for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Zatara

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice purchase. I bought one n then ordered a second one. I love these screens on wish it came with a remote
customer_reviews.author: Shawnette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Can't wait to have family outdoor movie night! No wrinkles and easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Kay Showley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing screen for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing screen for the price. We love using it periodically for movie nights and the kids can't get enough of it. The one concern I have is that the screen takes a bit of finesse to close completely.....other than that, it's perfect every way. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount. Easy to use. Might be dented. Might smell like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the ease of use. There are also 2 ways to hang the screen: metal loops on each end, and also a hole on the rear of the unit for mounting onto the wall via screws. However, my screen arrived dented and bent in multple places. Also, it smells like plastic and chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: jae andres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pull down
customer_reviews.text: Mounted to an outdoor wall for outdoor movies! This screen is perfect for movie night!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! We have movie nights every Sunday now. My family really feels like we are at the movies :)
customer_reviews.author: Dennis The Menace

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Mine arrived with a dent in it though. Still functions perfectly. I just leave it outside for movie nights. It's been holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Loka

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure not all of them are faulty but mine doesn't and it's pain dealing with theircustomer service.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE PRODUCT. THE HOLES TO HANG IT ARE A BIT SMALL, BUT I JUST DRILLED BIGGER ONES. BE CARE SO AS TO NOT BREAK ANYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: KEEGAN

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new projector screen, it doesn't come with mounting hardware but some drywall ling screws and plastics secured definitely did the trick. It does go from my ceiling to my floor but you can lock it in wherever
customer_reviews.author: Tayla

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product.
customer_reviews.text: We're enjoying watching movies on the big screen. Unfortunately, case has some dents and screen was little wrinkled (hence minus one star), but that is the minor thing and doesn't affect overall movie watching experience. I even use it sometimes as a white backdrop for photography...
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector screen for the money. I shopped around a bit, and this is a good price. I am not sure what the more expensive ones do. It seems to me that a white screen is a white screen. We wanted a screen for our back porch and this is perfect. It is a great size, and we haven't had any issues with it. We have had it up for a few months now, and it is doing exactly what it should. And watching movies on the back porch is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great screen.
customer_reviews.text: Only one thing, the end clasps are very weak. I plan on improving them with heavy rings. Other than that this screen is heavy duty and easy enough to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but it came slightly warped and never recovered. It's cheap though, so it's got that going for it, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: arrived super fast and in perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: arrived super fast and in perfect shape. not bent or damaged at all. installed in miuntes with ceiling hooks and couldnt be happier with the quality and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: SavageStudios712

customer_reviews.title: I don't think they come with it but kind of annoying because they shouldn't cost much but I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the hooks. I don't think they come with it but kind of annoying because they shouldn't cost much but I have to run to Home Depot. I plan on buying two sets of hooks to hang it in the house and outside for the kids for movie nights.
customer_reviews.author: Henny Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great image
customer_reviews.text: Bought this, primarily, for watching movies and gaming outdoors in the summer. It works quite well (window shade style retraction) and has good loops for hanging it in various places. It is quite heavy, but understandable for its size. The image quality is very good on this screen, at least with our 1080 projector.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cole

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: Came a few days late, but that's okay. Read what other wrote about the 1:1 ratio but didn't matter for me as I needed it to fit between our shelves. Suggest two people to install (although I was able to install it on my own).
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dan

customer_reviews.title: Turned out great!
customer_reviews.text: Turned out great and really happy with the price. Was easy to install and versatile to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality, great price point but is not 16:9 (84x84) and edges curl so it looks a little warped
customer_reviews.author: lfreak69

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the screen is a 4 but at the price it's a 5. Mine came with a cosmetic defect and they took mother 10 dollars off. Very happy with is screen.
customer_reviews.author: bigbaldguy

customer_reviews.title: Great screen and super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, that's what I call fast shipping!! I live in Idaho and it only took three days shipping and processing to get here. So far it's been an overall great product. It was super easy to hang up and it's a really clean projecting surface. No damage from shipping and no wrinkles on the screen like some other reviewers said that had me worried. Awesome product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: D.B. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Very great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! Very thick and durable. It is very easy to mount as well. Has great adjustability and it works as it should. The one thing I do have to say is it does smell a bit weird when you first use it. Like strong rubber/plastic smell. Goes away eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, Nice Clean Space for Projecting On To
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, and functionality. I’m only giving it four stars because I really didn’t notice much difference between my wall and the screen. All in all, I like the screen. Does give a nice clean space to project my tv on to.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor movies
customer_reviews.text: Have used this several times for outdoor movies this summer and it was awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Other reviews mentioned the “chemical” smell and it’s not too bad at all. It goes away after a few days. Came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. It weighs a lot, so attaching it to a prop bar is not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product seems very nice, I am disappointed that it was sent broken
customer_reviews.text: I received this projector with a hole in the bottom of the box. Once I opened it, I realized the plastic part of the projector screen was cracked and missing a piece. As I was analyzing it, the screen fell out and refuses to go back into the roll. The quality of the product seems very nice, I am disappointed that it was sent broken. I would love to get an exchange if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lim

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great screen so far, it shipped super fast and operates smoothly. Only problem is it arrived all dented and the screen's bottom bar was stuck inside the top casing. We got it out after some work and luckily the large dents are on the back, so it doesn't matter too much. Product: 5 stars, shipping/damage: 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Packaging!!!!!!! Protection!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok. Size is bigger than what I think. Only one very important problem! This item need to be packed much more professional! A big dent on it! Very lucky, it is on the back side of it, so that I accept it cuz I have no time to repack it and send it back and waiting for a new one and no guarantee about new one will have no dent ....
customer_reviews.author: cash440

customer_reviews.title: This screen is a great value. I have it wall mounted and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This screen is a great value. I have it wall mounted and it works very well. It opens easily, locks in place, and retracts without any issues. The screen is very large and the image from my Viewsonic projector looks great. For $65, I'm completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a bigger screen like being able to mount it in and out
customer_reviews.author: florent mbesse

customer_reviews.title: 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't comment on if the screen works well or not because there was a huge dent in it that prevented me from opening it. And it couldn't of been a shipping issue because the box was very sturdy with zero dents in it. Meaning they sent us an already dented screen. Returning this now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for more
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang large format screen. Pulls down and retracts up with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Way better than a sheet
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised it wasnt a piece of garbage. it is light so you can hang it almost anywhere. the casing is flimsey but it still works. the packaging was falling off and if the delivery company wasnt so good it would have been busted upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Bugnutz438

customer_reviews.title: Great screen but let it breathe before you use it the first time.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product and this company. My only issue was that when I pulled down the screen it off-gassed really bad and smelled really chemically terrible. I suggest pulling it down and letting it breath with no one around for a few days. But I received it right away with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our family room and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M Rubio

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 119in HD Indoor Pull-Down Manual Widescreen Projector Screen for Home Theater, Office - White
product_meta.description:
Bring the excitement of the movie theater to the comfort of your own home! This projector screen is the ultimate entertainment accessory to create the perfect media center. With a black border and matte white screen that helps to uniformly diffuse light, every television show, movie, or internet video will look crisp. The smooth pull-down screen and self-locking mechanism help to make it a convenient, space-saving solution for any media needs. Sit back and let the action begin in your very own at-home cinema. 

SPECIFICATIONS: 
Screen Dimensions: 92.5“(L) x 74.5“(H) 
Case Dimensions: 92.5”(L) x 4.75”(W) 
Diagonal Screen Dimensions: 119" 
Weight: 21.9 lbs. 
Material: Fabric, Metal 
Operation: Manual 
Gain: 1:1 
Viewing Angle: 160 degree 
No assembly required
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY DISPLAY: White matte, 1:1 high gain screen, and black border allow for a high-resolution display perfect for slideshows and TV marathons
PERSONAL MOVIE THEATER: Perfect for at home use in living rooms, bedrooms, and recreation rooms, or professional use in businesses and classrooms
STABLE VIEWING: Pull-down design and built-in locking mechanism ensures that the screen will stay in place for hours of fun, bonding, and entertainment
SPACE-SAVING: Mount the screen's lightweight, durable metal cased frame to a wall or ceiling for an entertainment center that can easily retract when not in use
HIGH DEFINITION PROJECTIONS: Pair it up with any LED, LCD, or DLP projector; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 92.5"(L) x 74.5"(H)
